Input parametre til modellering

Her ses input parametre til de forskellige typer af modeller. Generelle parametre relevante for alle modeller er indeholdt i ModellingArgParser, mens de tre afledte klasser MLMArgParser, SequenceModellingArgParser, NERArgParser indeholder parametre specifikt relevante for de tre modeltyper MLM, SS og NER.

class shared.modelling_utils.input_args.ModellingArgParser

General class to handle input args for model-training. Below arguments are grouped for a better overview.

Model

Parametre:

  • --custom_model_dir (str) – Whether to load model from specific directory (default: None)

  • --custom_model_name (str) – Whether to give model specific output name (default: None)

  • --save_config (bool) – Whether to save input args to file (default: True)

  • --freeze_embeddings (bool) – Whether to freeze embeddings layer. Must be freezed for DP at the moment (default: True)

  • --save_model_at_end (bool) – Whether to save final model after training. (default: True)

  • --freeze_layers (bool) – Whether to freeze all bert layers until freeze_layers_n_steps is reached. True is mandatory for DP at the moment (default: False)

  • --freeze_layers_n_steps (int) – Number of steps to train head only - if freeze_layers is true freeze_layers_n_steps must be > 0 (default: 0)

  • --sc_demo (bool) – Whether to use model for demo purposes - this is not for training (default: False)

Training

Parametre:

  • --local_testing (bool) – Whether to test on local machine with small subset (default:False)

  • --differential_privacy (bool) – Whether to train model with differential privacy (default: True)

  • --max_length (int) – Max length for a text input (default: 64)

  • --epochs (int) – Number of epochs to train model (default: 20)

  • --weight_decay (float) – Weight decay (default: 0.01)

  • --use_fp16 (bool) – Set to True, if your GPU supports FP16 operations (default: False)

  • --lot_size (int) – Lot size specifies the sample size of which noise is injected into. Must be larger and multiple of batch size – in None-DP models lot size is set to train_batch_size, which is then used as training batch size (default: 64)

  • --train_batch_size (int) – Batch size specifies the sample size of which the gradients are computed (default: 32)

  • --device (str) – Device to train on, can be either ›cuda‹ or ›cpu‹ ( default: cuda)

  • --auto_lr_scheduling (bool) – Whether to compute lr_warmup and decay automatically (lr_warmup_steps = 10% of steps training full model lr_start_decay = 50% of training full model) (default: True)

  • --lr_freezed (float) – Number of steps to train head only (default: 0.0005)

  • --lr_freezed_warmup_steps (int) – Number of steps to train head only (default: 1000)

  • --learning_rate (float) – Learning rate (default: 5e-05)

  • --lr_warmup_steps (int) – Warmup learning rate - set to 1 if no warmup (default: 6000)

  • --lr_start_decay (int) – After which step to start decaying learning rate (default: 46000)

Evaluation

Parametre:

  • --evaluate_steps (int) – Evaluate model accuracy after number of steps (default: 50000)

  • --logging_steps (int) – Log model accuracy after number of steps (default: 5000)

  • --save_steps (int) – Save checkpoint after number of steps (default: 50000)

  • --save_only_best_model (bool) – Whether to only save best model - overwrites save_steps if True (default: True)

  • --eval_batch_size (int) – Batch size for evaluation (default: 32)

  • --evaluate_during_training (bool) – Whether to evaluate model during training (default: True)

  • --make_plots (bool) – Whether to plot running learning rate, loss and accuracies (default: True)

  • --eval_metrics (List[str]) – Define eval metrics to evaluate best model (default: [›loss‹, ›accuracy‹])

Differential privacy

Parametre:

  • --epsilon (float) – Privacy parameter epsilon (default: 1)

  • --compute_delta (bool) – Whether to compute delta such that delta=1/len(train) (default:True)

  • --delta (float) – Privacy parameter delta. Usually a good delta is 1/len(train) (default: 4.6e-05)

  • --max_grad_norm (float) – Maximum norm to clip gradient (default: 1.2)

class mlm.modelling_utils.input_args.MLMArgParser

Class inherited from ModellingArgParser to handle input args for unsupervised Masked Language Modelling. Below arguments are grouped for a better overview.

Data

Parametre:

  • --train_data (str) – Training data file name (default: train.jsonl)

  • --eval_data (str) – Validation data file name (default: validation.jsonl)

  • --load_alvenir_pretrained (bool) – Whether to load local alvenir model (default: False)

MLM Model

Parametre:

  • --model_name – Foundation model from huggingface (default: NbAiLab/nb-bert-base)

  • --whole_word_mask (bool) – If set to true, whole words are masked ( default: False)

  • --mlm_prob (float) – Probability that a word is replaced by a [MASK] token (default:0.15)

  • --replace_head (bool) – Whether to replace bert head. True is mandatory for MLM with DP - Also set freeze_layers to true if replace_head is true (default: True)

class ner.modelling_utils.input_args.NERArgParser

Class inherited from ModellingArgParser to handle input args for unsupervised Masked Language Modelling. Below arguments are grouped for a better overview.

Data

Parametre:

  • --train_data (str) – Training data file name (default: dane)

  • --eval_data (str) – Validation data file name (default: dane)

  • --data_subset (int) – Whether to subset data. Must be int between 1 and 100=None. Only relevant while we are training and testing on dane. (default: None)

NER Model

Parametre:

  • --load_alvenir_pretrained (bool) – Whether to load local alvenir model (default: True)

  • --model_name (str) – Foundation model from huggingface or alvenir pretrained model (default: last_model)

class sc.modelling_utils.input_args.SequenceModellingArgParser

Class inherited from ModellingArgParser to handle input args for supervised SequenceClassification. Below arguments are grouped for a better overview.

Data

Parametre:

  • --train_data (str) – Training data file name (default: train_classified.jsonl)

  • --eval_data (str) – Validation data file name (default: eval_classified.jsonl)

  • --test_data (str) – Validation data file name (default: test_classified.jsonl)

Sequence Classification Model

Parametre:

  • --load_alvenir_pretrained (bool) – Whether to load local alvenir model (default: True)

  • --model_name – Foundation model from huggingface (default: last_model)

Forrige
